summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.6°C), outside temperature (down 2.6°C), and inside temperature (down 1.7°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (down 144 m), and light levels (down 5828 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and winds should remain light. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and very bright daylight. Weather patterns to stay the same.
